summary: A very small, mage themed vampire lair located on the coast near Windhelm.
descriptionHtml:
It's me again, with yet another Vampire Home mod! This is my second ever mod, and was originally intended as more of a testing ground for activators and such. It ended up turning into quite a nice lair that I'm quite happy with. This very small lair is intended for a wizard type vampire who lives alone. Hidden behind a 'teleporter' on the coast near Windhelm, Iceblood Lair has just about everything a wizardy vampire needs. Let me know if you have any problems or feedback, and I'll do my best to fix things quickly! Hope you enjoy it.

[b][u]This lair features:[/u][/b]
- One coffin for a vampire.
- Two mannequins.
- Two display cases.
- A bookshelf.
- An Alchemy crafting station with storage.
- An Enchanting crafting station with storage.
- A Blood Shrine in the basement that increases your Destruction Spell Damage by 10%, counts as feeding, but decreases your movement speed by 20% for 24 hours.
- A really big safe for treasures.
- A nice atmosphere, with vampire friendly dim lights.
- A bit of lore for the lair, which you can read in a journal on the writing desk.
- A teleport pedestal instead of a door. Simply activate the pedestals to go in and out of your home. No need to worry about vampire slayers kicking your door down!
- Follower friendly (although they'll have to sleep on the floor)

[b][u]Future Plans[/u][/b]
I don't have any further plans for this mod, beyond fixing any bugs that pop up. This is intended for quite a specific type of character. Windhelm is very close by for all of your merchant, feeding and blacksmithing needs, and Hjerim would make a nicer family home anyway.

[b][u]Requirements:[/u][/b]
- A functioning PC
- A legit copy of Skyrim and the Dawnguard DLC

[b][u]Credits and Thank You's:[/u][/b]
- Blary and Oaristys for their excellent modders resources.
- Dragondude1029 and IsharaMeradin on the Nexus Forums for helping me make the custom door.
- Bethesda for the game.
- The Nexus team for the awesome site
- The many people doing creation kit tutorials for helping idiots like me.

[b][u]Changes:[/u][/b]
V1.1
- Edited the 'Notes on Iceblood Lair' book to make it look a little neater inside.
- Changed the blessing given by the shrine. The bonus to destruction damage is now 10% (down from 20%), and the Slow effect is now 20% (down from 50%).
